children.value: The episode begins with two short bits.  In the first bit,

, and friends are hanging out in someone's room and David cracks a joke implying Natalie bought lingerie to look good for David.  The second bit is in David's car and Suzy is in the front seat.  David is lipsyncing
making her a little uncomfortable, then it cuts to him making a joke "how much do you wanna fuck me right now?".
The bulk of this episode is a scene with David,

at David's old, Christmas-decorated apartment. It starts with Jeff and Natalie, both dressed in Christmas themed attire, trying to fake a kiss for the camera but Natalie accidentally full-on kisses him, which dissolves into laughter as they can't finish the bit, Jeff says "It's a Christmas miracle!".  Next, there are a series of holiday-inspired shots including putting the star on the tree, Jeff puts whipped cream on Natalie's Nose, Natalie blows glitter in front of Jeff's face.  The shots end with David saying how great  Christmas is this year, and then it pans over to the hallways where Jonah, Alex, and Jason are standing.

In the past, the Christmas-y episode included Alex and Jason so they are upset that they weren't including in this year's video.  For the next few minutes, there is an all-out war between all 6 people where they absolutely destroy the apartment, breaking tables, shattering pottery on the floor, spilling milk and eggnog on each other, and choking.  The shots end with Natalie throwing some piece of pottery against the wall behind Jonah in the kitchen, then Jonah's pretends to get out of character and tells Natalie she's gone too far.
The next shot is David with

, David asks Erin how did she find love since both him and Carly are single.  Erin responds, "Bumble" (the dating app).  David, being the entrepreneur he is, immediately calls his contact at Bumble and asks how much money they would give him to keep that in the vlog, and the contact gives him a number that's bleeped out.  The rest of the video is a montage of him giving random people money.  He gives a Chinese woman at a bakery what looks like a $10,000 tip, he gives a guy who sells flowers a bunch of money, Natalie uses the money gun to shoot 20 dollar bills into a crowd of teenagers, and finally, they go to an apple store and buy close to 100 iPads and give them to

properties.title: Boys and Girls Club of LA

children.value: The Boys and Girls Club of Los Angeles
The episode ends with one of the boys who won an iPad saying "Subscribe to David Dobrik", some bloopers from the Christmas scene, and David scaring Natalie.
